entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 30 gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 50 gusting to 80 after midnight. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 5:05 PM MST Tuesday 31 January 2023
